name: ionic cordova platform
description: Like running `cordova platform` directly, but adds default Ionic icons and splash screen resources (during `add`) and provides friendly checks.

inputs.name: action
inputs.summary: `add`, `remove`, or `update` a platform; `ls`, `check`, or `save` all project platforms

inputs.name: platform
inputs.summary: The platform that you would like to add (`android`, `ios`)

options.name: resources
options.summary: Do not pregenerate icons and splash screen resources (corresponds to `add`)
